Business Name: Duffy's Garage Land Rover, BMW, Jaguar, Audi, & Mini Cooper

Business Information:
We are a family owned and operated Honda, Acura, Nissan, Infiniti, Toyota and Lexus repair facility with 24 month or 24,000 mile warranty on most items. We take pride in delivering a higher level of quality service.  
ABOUT US.....As childhood friends, Eddie Cleveland and Angelo Roberson shared a passion for figuring out how things worked; specifically motorcycles and cars. More to the point, they spent a lot of time figuring out why something didnt work. Like most passions, it was only a matter of time before it became a profession. In 1983, Eddie and Angelo formed Robe Mans, working as mechanics servicing only Honda vehicles. When Honda introduced the upscale Acura line, they started servicing the Acura line. As time passed on, health concerns drove Angelo to retire. Eddie continued to run the ever-growing business, concentrating on maintaining the kind of personal and professional service that has earned Robe Mans a stellar reputation. In 2006, after numerous customer requests, Robe Mans decided to extend their services to include Toyota and Lexus, purchasing the building next door to their existing facility to accommodate the newly added lines. In 2012, again by popular demand and multiple customer requests, Rob'e Mans extended its professional service to include the Nissan and Infiniti brands. Today, Eddie Cleveland and the staff at Robe Mans continues to provide the kind of customer-focused service that started back in 1983, earning and keeping the trust of his customers by providing quality services with a personal touch.

Business Name: Duffy's Garage Land Rover, BMW, Jaguar, Audi, & Mini Cooper

Business Information:
We are a family owned and operated Honda, Acura, Nissan, Infiniti, Toyota and Lexus repair facility with 24 month or 24,000 mile warranty on most items. We take pride in delivering a higher level of quality service.  
ABOUT US.....As childhood friends, Eddie Cleveland and Angelo Roberson shared a passion for figuring out how things worked; specifically motorcycles and cars. More to the point, they spent a lot of time figuring out why something didnt work. Like most passions, it was only a matter of time before it became a profession. In 1983, Eddie and Angelo formed Robe Mans, working as mechanics servicing only Honda vehicles. When Honda introduced the upscale Acura line, they started servicing the Acura line. As time passed on, health concerns drove Angelo to retire. Eddie continued to run the ever-growing business, concentrating on maintaining the kind of personal and professional service that has earned Robe Mans a stellar reputation. In 2006, after numerous customer requests, Robe Mans decided to extend their services to include Toyota and Lexus, purchasing the building next door to their existing facility to accommodate the newly added lines. In 2012, again by popular demand and multiple customer requests, Rob'e Mans extended its professional service to include the Nissan and Infiniti brands. Today, Eddie Cleveland and the staff at Robe Mans continues to provide the kind of customer-focused service that started back in 1983, earning and keeping the trust of his customers by providing quality services with a personal touch.

We are a family owned and operated Honda, Acura, Nissan, Infiniti, Toyota and Lexus repair facility with 24 month or 24,000 mile warranty on most items. We take pride in delivering a higher level of quality service.  
ABOUT US.....As childhood friends, Eddie Cleveland and Angelo Roberson shared a passion for figuring out how things worked; specifically motorcycles and cars. More to the point, they spent a lot of time figuring out why something didnt work. Like most passions, it was only a matter of time before it became a profession. In 1983, Eddie and Angelo formed Robe Mans, working as mechanics servicing only Honda vehicles. When Honda introduced the upscale Acura line, they started servicing the Acura line. As time passed on, health concerns drove Angelo to retire. Eddie continued to run the ever-growing business, concentrating on maintaining the kind of personal and professional service that has earned Robe Mans a stellar reputation. In 2006, after numerous customer requests, Robe Mans decided to extend their services to include Toyota and Lexus, purchasing the building next door to their existing facility to accommodate the newly added lines. In 2012, again by popular demand and multiple customer requests, Rob'e Mans extended its professional service to include the Nissan and Infiniti brands. Today, Eddie Cleveland and the staff at Robe Mans continues to provide the kind of customer-focused service that started back in 1983, earning and keeping the trust of his customers by providing quality services with a personal touch.

Business Name: Duffy's Garage Land Rover, BMW, Jaguar, Audi, & Mini Cooper

Business Information:
We are a family owned and operated Honda, Acura, Nissan, Infiniti, Toyota and Lexus repair facility with 24 month or 24,000 mile warranty on most items. We take pride in delivering a higher level of quality service.  
ABOUT US.....As childhood friends, Eddie Cleveland and Angelo Roberson shared a passion for figuring out how things worked; specifically motorcycles and cars. More to the point, they spent a lot of time figuring out why something didnt work. Like most passions, it was only a matter of time before it became a profession. In 1983, Eddie and Angelo formed Robe Mans, working as mechanics servicing only Honda vehicles. When Honda introduced the upscale Acura line, they started servicing the Acura line. As time passed on, health concerns drove Angelo to retire. Eddie continued to run the ever-growing business, concentrating on maintaining the kind of personal and professional service that has earned Robe Mans a stellar reputation. In 2006, after numerous customer requests, Robe Mans decided to extend their services to include Toyota and Lexus, purchasing the building next door to their existing facility to accommodate the newly added lines. In 2012, again by popular demand and multiple customer requests, Rob'e Mans extended its professional service to include the Nissan and Infiniti brands. Today, Eddie Cleveland and the staff at Robe Mans continues to provide the kind of customer-focused service that started back in 1983, earning and keeping the trust of his customers by providing quality services with a personal touch.

Business Name: Duffy's Garage Land Rover, BMW, Jaguar, Audi, & Mini Cooper

Business Information:
We are a family owned and operated Honda, Acura, Nissan, Infiniti, Toyota and Lexus repair facility with 24 month or 24,000 mile warranty on most items. We take pride in delivering a higher level of quality service.  
ABOUT US.....As childhood friends, Eddie Cleveland and Angelo Roberson shared a passion for figuring out how things worked; specifically motorcycles and cars. More to the point, they spent a lot of time figuring out why something didnt work. Like most passions, it was only a matter of time before it became a profession. In 1983, Eddie and Angelo formed Robe Mans, working as mechanics servicing only Honda vehicles. When Honda introduced the upscale Acura line, they started servicing the Acura line. As time passed on, health concerns drove Angelo to retire. Eddie continued to run the ever-growing business, concentrating on maintaining the kind of personal and professional service that has earned Robe Mans a stellar reputation. In 2006, after numerous customer requests, Robe Mans decided to extend their services to include Toyota and Lexus, purchasing the building next door to their existing facility to accommodate the newly added lines. In 2012, again by popular demand and multiple customer requests, Rob'e Mans extended its professional service to include the Nissan and Infiniti brands. Today, Eddie Cleveland and the staff at Robe Mans continues to provide the kind of customer-focused service that started back in 1983, earning and keeping the trust of his customers by providing quality services with a personal touch.

Bennette Pool began Bennette's Motor World in March of 2004. Because the local BMW dealer had just left one month prior and the Mercedes dealer had left the year before, Bennette felt there was a need for continued quality and convenient service in the downtown area. Bennette has 25 years experience in the automotive business. He has worked for two of the largest dealerships in Birmingham, Alabama. His career started as a technician. After several years as a technician he became a Service Advisor and then a Service Manager. As you can see, Bennette has both product and technical knowledge of an automobile. His experience as a manager has allowed him the opportunity to establish a one on one relationship with his customers. Because of this, his customers know that the concerns they have are his personal concerns and he treats their needs in this manner which gives them peace of mind that their car is in the best of care. Bennette's factory trained technicians are ASC Certified, and were selected with the customer in mind for their expertise and knowledge. They have over 75 years combined experience with BMW and Mercedes. His BMW factory diagnostic equipment is state of the art and Bennette's Motor World is 1 of 6 service centers in the state of Alabama that owns this system. The Mercedes diagnostic equipment is also the latest and most updated. Bennette welcomes you to Bennette's Motor World and will make sure your needs are met by a friendly and courteous staff with the quality and knowledge required for your automotive repairs.

Business Name: Duffy's Garage Land Rover, BMW, Jaguar, Audi, & Mini Cooper

Business Information:
We are a family owned and operated Honda, Acura, Nissan, Infiniti, Toyota and Lexus repair facility with 24 month or 24,000 mile warranty on most items. We take pride in delivering a higher level of quality service.  
ABOUT US.....As childhood friends, Eddie Cleveland and Angelo Roberson shared a passion for figuring out how things worked; specifically motorcycles and cars. More to the point, they spent a lot of time figuring out why something didnt work. Like most passions, it was only a matter of time before it became a profession. In 1983, Eddie and Angelo formed Robe Mans, working as mechanics servicing only Honda vehicles. When Honda introduced the upscale Acura line, they started servicing the Acura line. As time passed on, health concerns drove Angelo to retire. Eddie continued to run the ever-growing business, concentrating on maintaining the kind of personal and professional service that has earned Robe Mans a stellar reputation. In 2006, after numerous customer requests, Robe Mans decided to extend their services to include Toyota and Lexus, purchasing the building next door to their existing facility to accommodate the newly added lines. In 2012, again by popular demand and multiple customer requests, Rob'e Mans extended its professional service to include the Nissan and Infiniti brands. Today, Eddie Cleveland and the staff at Robe Mans continues to provide the kind of customer-focused service that started back in 1983, earning and keeping the trust of his customers by providing quality services with a personal touch.

Bennette Pool began Bennette's Motor World in March of 2004. Because the local BMW dealer had just left one month prior and the Mercedes dealer had left the year before, Bennette felt there was a need for continued quality and convenient service in the downtown area. Bennette has 25 years experience in the automotive business. He has worked for two of the largest dealerships in Birmingham, Alabama. His career started as a technician. After several years as a technician he became a Service Advisor and then a Service Manager. As you can see, Bennette has both product and technical knowledge of an automobile. His experience as a manager has allowed him the opportunity to establish a one on one relationship with his customers. Because of this, his customers know that the concerns they have are his personal concerns and he treats their needs in this manner which gives them peace of mind that their car is in the best of care. Bennette's factory trained technicians are ASC Certified, and were selected with the customer in mind for their expertise and knowledge. They have over 75 years combined experience with BMW and Mercedes. His BMW factory diagnostic equipment is state of the art and Bennette's Motor World is 1 of 6 service centers in the state of Alabama that owns this system. The Mercedes diagnostic equipment is also the latest and most updated. Bennette welcomes you to Bennette's Motor World and will make sure your needs are met by a friendly and courteous staff with the quality and knowledge required for your automotive repairs.

We are a family owned and operated Honda, Acura, Nissan, Infiniti, Toyota and Lexus repair facility with 24 month or 24,000 mile warranty on most items. We take pride in delivering a higher level of quality service.  
ABOUT US.....As childhood friends, Eddie Cleveland and Angelo Roberson shared a passion for figuring out how things worked; specifically motorcycles and cars. More to the point, they spent a lot of time figuring out why something didnt work. Like most passions, it was only a matter of time before it became a profession. In 1983, Eddie and Angelo formed Robe Mans, working as mechanics servicing only Honda vehicles. When Honda introduced the upscale Acura line, they started servicing the Acura line. As time passed on, health concerns drove Angelo to retire. Eddie continued to run the ever-growing business, concentrating on maintaining the kind of personal and professional service that has earned Robe Mans a stellar reputation. In 2006, after numerous customer requests, Robe Mans decided to extend their services to include Toyota and Lexus, purchasing the building next door to their existing facility to accommodate the newly added lines. In 2012, again by popular demand and multiple customer requests, Rob'e Mans extended its professional service to include the Nissan and Infiniti brands. Today, Eddie Cleveland and the staff at Robe Mans continues to provide the kind of customer-focused service that started back in 1983, earning and keeping the trust of his customers by providing quality services with a personal touch.

Bennette Pool began Bennette's Motor World in March of 2004. Because the local BMW dealer had just left one month prior and the Mercedes dealer had left the year before, Bennette felt there was a need for continued quality and convenient service in the downtown area. Bennette has 25 years experience in the automotive business. He has worked for two of the largest dealerships in Birmingham, Alabama. His career started as a technician. After several years as a technician he became a Service Advisor and then a Service Manager. As you can see, Bennette has both product and technical knowledge of an automobile. His experience as a manager has allowed him the opportunity to establish a one on one relationship with his customers. Because of this, his customers know that the concerns they have are his personal concerns and he treats their needs in this manner which gives them peace of mind that their car is in the best of care. Bennette's factory trained technicians are ASC Certified, and were selected with the customer in mind for their expertise and knowledge. They have over 75 years combined experience with BMW and Mercedes. His BMW factory diagnostic equipment is state of the art and Bennette's Motor World is 1 of 6 service centers in the state of Alabama that owns this system. The Mercedes diagnostic equipment is also the latest and most updated. Bennette welcomes you to Bennette's Motor World and will make sure your needs are met by a friendly and courteous staff with the quality and knowledge required for your automotive repairs.

Business Name: Duffy's Garage Land Rover, BMW, Jaguar, Audi, & Mini Cooper

Business Information:
We are a family owned and operated Honda, Acura, Nissan, Infiniti, Toyota and Lexus repair facility with 24 month or 24,000 mile warranty on most items. We take pride in delivering a higher level of quality service.  
ABOUT US.....As childhood friends, Eddie Cleveland and Angelo Roberson shared a passion for figuring out how things worked; specifically motorcycles and cars. More to the point, they spent a lot of time figuring out why something didnt work. Like most passions, it was only a matter of time before it became a profession. In 1983, Eddie and Angelo formed Robe Mans, working as mechanics servicing only Honda vehicles. When Honda introduced the upscale Acura line, they started servicing the Acura line. As time passed on, health concerns drove Angelo to retire. Eddie continued to run the ever-growing business, concentrating on maintaining the kind of personal and professional service that has earned Robe Mans a stellar reputation. In 2006, after numerous customer requests, Robe Mans decided to extend their services to include Toyota and Lexus, purchasing the building next door to their existing facility to accommodate the newly added lines. In 2012, again by popular demand and multiple customer requests, Rob'e Mans extended its professional service to include the Nissan and Infiniti brands. Today, Eddie Cleveland and the staff at Robe Mans continues to provide the kind of customer-focused service that started back in 1983, earning and keeping the trust of his customers by providing quality services with a personal touch.

Bennette Pool began Bennette's Motor World in March of 2004. Because the local BMW dealer had just left one month prior and the Mercedes dealer had left the year before, Bennette felt there was a need for continued quality and convenient service in the downtown area. Bennette has 25 years experience in the automotive business. He has worked for two of the largest dealerships in Birmingham, Alabama. His career started as a technician. After several years as a technician he became a Service Advisor and then a Service Manager. As you can see, Bennette has both product and technical knowledge of an automobile. His experience as a manager has allowed him the opportunity to establish a one on one relationship with his customers. Because of this, his customers know that the concerns they have are his personal concerns and he treats their needs in this manner which gives them peace of mind that their car is in the best of care. Business Name: Duffy's Garage Land Rover, BMW, Jaguar, Audi, & Mini Cooper

Business Information:
We are a family owned and operated Honda, Acura, Nissan, Infiniti, Toyota and Lexus repair facility with 24 month or 24,000 mile warranty on most items. We take pride in delivering a higher level of quality service.  
ABOUT US.....As childhood friends, Eddie Cleveland and Angelo Roberson shared a passion for figuring out how things worked; specifically motorcycles and cars. More to the point, they spent a lot of time figuring out why something didnt work. Like most passions, it was only a matter of time before it became a profession. In 1983, Eddie and Angelo formed Robe Mans, working as mechanics servicing only Honda vehicles. When Honda introduced the upscale Acura line, they started servicing the Acura line. As time passed on, health concerns drove Angelo to retire. Eddie continued to run the ever-growing business, concentrating on maintaining the kind of personal and professional service that has earned Robe Mans a stellar reputation. In 2006, after numerous customer requests, Robe Mans decided to extend their services to include Toyota and Lexus, purchasing the building next door to their existing facility to accommodate the newly added lines. In 2012, again by popular demand and multiple customer requests, Rob'e Mans extended its professional service to include the Nissan and Infiniti brands. Today, Eddie Cleveland and the staff at Robe Mans continues to provide the kind of customer-focused service that started back in 1983, earning and keeping the trust of his customers by providing quality services with a personal touch.

Bennette has 25 years experience in the automotive business. He has worked for two of the largest dealerships in Birmingham, Alabama. His career started as a technician. After several years as a technician he became a Service Advisor and then a Service Manager. As you can see, Bennette has both product and technical knowledge of an automobile. Business Name: Duffy's Garage Land Rover, BMW, Jaguar, Audi, & Mini Cooper

Business Information:
We are a family owned and operated Honda, Acura, Nissan, Infiniti, Toyota and Lexus repair facility with 24 month or 24,000 mile warranty on most items. We take pride in delivering a higher level of quality service.  
ABOUT US.....As childhood friends, Eddie Cleveland and Angelo Roberson shared a passion for figuring out how things worked; specifically motorcycles and cars. More to the point, they spent a lot of time figuring out why something didnt work. Like most passions, it was only a matter of time before it became a profession. In 1983, Eddie and Angelo formed Robe Mans, working as mechanics servicing only Honda vehicles. When Honda introduced the upscale Acura line, they started servicing the Acura line. As time passed on, health concerns drove Angelo to retire. Eddie continued to run the ever-growing business, concentrating on maintaining the kind of personal and professional service that has earned Robe Mans a stellar reputation. In 2006, after numerous customer requests, Robe Mans decided to extend their services to include Toyota and Lexus, purchasing the building next door to their existing facility to accommodate the newly added lines. In 2012, again by popular demand and multiple customer requests, Rob'e Mans extended its professional service to include the Nissan and Infiniti brands. Today, Eddie Cleveland and the staff at Robe Mans continues to provide the kind of customer-focused service that started back in 1983, earning and keeping the trust of his customers by providing quality services with a personal touch.

Business Name: Duffy's Garage Land Rover, BMW, Jaguar, Audi, & Mini Cooper

Business Information:
We are a family owned and operated Honda, Acura, Nissan, Infiniti, Toyota and Lexus repair facility with 24 month or 24,000 mile warranty on most items. We take pride in delivering a higher level of quality service.  
ABOUT US.....As childhood friends, Eddie Cleveland and Angelo Roberson shared a passion for figuring out how things worked; specifically motorcycles and cars. More to the point, they spent a lot of time figuring out why something didnt work. Like most passions, it was only a matter of time before it became a profession. In 1983, Eddie and Angelo formed Robe Mans, working as mechanics servicing only Honda vehicles. When Honda introduced the upscale Acura line, they started servicing the Acura line. As time passed on, health concerns drove Angelo to retire. Eddie continued to run the ever-growing business, concentrating on maintaining the kind of personal and professional service that has earned Robe Mans a stellar reputation. In 2006, after numerous customer requests, Robe Mans decided to extend their services to include Toyota and Lexus, purchasing the building next door to their existing facility to accommodate the newly added lines. In 2012, again by popular demand and multiple customer requests, Rob'e Mans extended its professional service to include the Nissan and Infiniti brands. Today, Eddie Cleveland and the staff at Robe Mans continues to provide the kind of customer-focused service that started back in 1983, earning and keeping the trust of his customers by providing quality services with a personal touch.

Bennette Pool began Bennette's Motor World in March of 2004. Bennette has 25 years experience in the automotive business. He has worked for two of the largest dealerships in Birmingham, Alabama. His career started as a technician. After several years as a technician he became a Service Advisor and then a Service Manager. As you can see, Bennette has both product and technical knowledge of an automobile. His experience as a manager has allowed him the opportunity to establish a one on one relationship with his customers. Business Name: Duffy's Garage Land Rover, BMW, Jaguar, Audi, & Mini Cooper

Business Information:
We are a family owned and operated Honda, Acura, Nissan, Infiniti, Toyota and Lexus repair facility with 24 month or 24,000 mile warranty on most items. We take pride in delivering a higher level of quality service.  
ABOUT US.....As childhood friends, Eddie Cleveland and Angelo Roberson shared a passion for figuring out how things worked; specifically motorcycles and cars. More to the point, they spent a lot of time figuring out why something didnt work. Like most passions, it was only a matter of time before it became a profession. In 1983, Eddie and Angelo formed Robe Mans, working as mechanics servicing only Honda vehicles. When Honda introduced the upscale Acura line, they started servicing the Acura line. As time passed on, health concerns drove Angelo to retire. Eddie continued to run the ever-growing business, concentrating on maintaining the kind of personal and professional service that has earned Robe Mans a stellar reputation. In 2006, after numerous customer requests, Robe Mans decided to extend their services to include Toyota and Lexus, purchasing the building next door to their existing facility to accommodate the newly added lines. In 2012, again by popular demand and multiple customer requests, Rob'e Mans extended its professional service to include the Nissan and Infiniti brands. Today, Eddie Cleveland and the staff at Robe Mans continues to provide the kind of customer-focused service that started back in 1983, earning and keeping the trust of his customers by providing quality services with a personal touch.

Business Name: Duffy's Garage Land Rover, BMW, Jaguar, Audi, & Mini Cooper

Business Information:
We are a family owned and operated Honda, Acura, Nissan, Infiniti, Toyota and Lexus repair facility with 24 month or 24,000 mile warranty on most items. We take pride in delivering a higher level of quality service.  
ABOUT US.....As childhood friends, Eddie Cleveland and Angelo Roberson shared a passion for figuring out how things worked; specifically motorcycles and cars. More to the point, they spent a lot of time figuring out why something didnt work. Like most passions, it was only a matter of time before it became a profession. In 1983, Eddie and Angelo formed Robe Mans, working as mechanics servicing only Honda vehicles. When Honda introduced the upscale Acura line, they started servicing the Acura line. As time passed on, health concerns drove Angelo to retire. Eddie continued to run the ever-growing business, concentrating on maintaining the kind of personal and professional service that has earned Robe Mans a stellar reputation. In 2006, after numerous customer requests, Robe Mans decided to extend their services to include Toyota and Lexus, purchasing the building next door to their existing facility to accommodate the newly added lines. In 2012, again by popular demand and multiple customer requests, Rob'e Mans extended its professional service to include the Nissan and Infiniti brands. Today, Eddie Cleveland and the staff at Robe Mans continues to provide the kind of customer-focused service that started back in 1983, earning and keeping the trust of his customers by providing quality services with a personal touch.

Bennette Pool began Bennette's Motor World in March of 2004. Because the local BMW dealer had just left one month prior and the Mercedes dealer had left the year before, Bennette felt there was a need for continued quality and convenient service in the downtown area. Bennette has 25 years experience in the automotive business. He has worked for two of the largest dealerships in Birmingham, Alabama. His career started as a technician. After several years as a technician he became a Service Advisor and then a Service Manager. As you can see, Bennette has both product and technical knowledge of an automobile. His experience as a manager has allowed him the opportunity to establish a one on one relationship with his customers. Because of this, his customers know that the concerns they have are his personal concerns and he treats their needs in this manner which gives them peace of mind that their car is in the best of care. Bennette's factory trained technicians are ASC Certified, and were selected with the customer in mind for their expertise and knowledge. They have over 75 years combined experience with BMW and Mercedes. His BMW factory diagnostic equipment is state of the art and Bennette's Motor World is 1 of 6 service centers in the state of Alabama that owns this system. The Mercedes diagnostic equipment is also the latest and most updated. Bennette welcomes you to Bennette's Motor World and will make sure your needs are met by a friendly and courteous staff with the quality and knowledge required for your automotive repairs.

Business Name: Duffy's Garage Land Rover, BMW, Jaguar, Audi, & Mini Cooper

Business Information:
We are a family owned and operated Honda, Acura, Nissan, Infiniti, Toyota and Lexus repair facility with 24 month or 24,000 mile warranty on most items. We take pride in delivering a higher level of quality service.  
ABOUT US.....As childhood friends, Eddie Cleveland and Angelo Roberson shared a passion for figuring out how things worked; specifically motorcycles and cars. More to the point, they spent a lot of time figuring out why something didnt work. Like most passions, it was only a matter of time before it became a profession. In 1983, Eddie and Angelo formed Robe Mans, working as mechanics servicing only Honda vehicles. When Honda introduced the upscale Acura line, they started servicing the Acura line. As time passed on, health concerns drove Angelo to retire. Eddie continued to run the ever-growing business, concentrating on maintaining the kind of personal and professional service that has earned Robe Mans a stellar reputation. In 2006, after numerous customer requests, Robe Mans decided to extend their services to include Toyota and Lexus, purchasing the building next door to their existing facility to accommodate the newly added lines. In 2012, again by popular demand and multiple customer requests, Rob'e Mans extended its professional service to include the Nissan and Infiniti brands. Today, Eddie Cleveland and the staff at Robe Mans continues to provide the kind of customer-focused service that started back in 1983, earning and keeping the trust of his customers by providing quality services with a personal touch.

After several years as a technician he became a Service Advisor and then a Service Manager. As you can see, Bennette has both product and technical knowledge of an automobile. His experience as a manager has allowed him the opportunity to establish a one on one relationship with his customers. Because of this, his customers know that the concerns they have are his personal concerns and he treats their needs in this manner which gives them peace of mind that their car is in the best of care. Bennette's factory trained technicians are ASC Certified, and were selected with the customer in mind for their expertise and knowledge. They have over 75 years combined experience with BMW and Mercedes. His BMW factory diagnostic equipment is state of the art and Bennette's Motor World is 1 of 6 service centers in the state of Alabama that owns this system. The Mercedes diagnostic equipment is also the latest and most updated. Bennette welcomes you to Bennette's Motor World and will make sure your needs are met by a friendly and courteous staff with the quality and knowledge required for your automotive repairs.

Business Name: Duffy's Garage Land Rover, BMW, Jaguar, Audi, & Mini Cooper

Business Information:
We are a family owned and operated Honda, Acura, Nissan, Infiniti, Toyota and Lexus repair facility with 24 month or 24,000 mile warranty on most items. We take pride in delivering a higher level of quality service.  
ABOUT US.....As childhood friends, Eddie Cleveland and Angelo Roberson shared a passion for figuring out how things worked; specifically motorcycles and cars. More to the point, they spent a lot of time figuring out why something didnt work. Like most passions, it was only a matter of time before it became a profession. In 1983, Eddie and Angelo formed Robe Mans, working as mechanics servicing only Honda vehicles. When Honda introduced the upscale Acura line, they started servicing the Acura line. As time passed on, health concerns drove Angelo to retire. Eddie continued to run the ever-growing business, concentrating on maintaining the kind of personal and professional service that has earned Robe Mans a stellar reputation. In 2006, after numerous customer requests, Robe Mans decided to extend their services to include Toyota and Lexus, purchasing the building next door to their existing facility to accommodate the newly added lines. In 2012, again by popular demand and multiple customer requests, Rob'e Mans extended its professional service to include the Nissan and Infiniti brands. Today, Eddie Cleveland and the staff at Robe Mans continues to provide the kind of customer-focused service that started back in 1983, earning and keeping the trust of his customers by providing quality services with a personal touch.

Bennette Pool began Bennette's Motor World in March of 2004. Because the local BMW dealer had just left one month prior and the Mercedes dealer had left the year before, Bennette felt there was a need for continued quality and convenient service in the downtown area. Bennette has 25 years experience in the automotive business. He has worked for two of the largest dealerships in Birmingham, Alabama. His career started as a technician. After several years as a technician he became a Service Advisor and then a Service Manager. As you can see, Bennette has both product and technical knowledge of an automobile. His experience as a manager has allowed him the opportunity to establish a one on one relationship with his customers. Because of this, his customers know that the concerns they have are his personal concerns and he treats their needs in this manner which gives them peace of mind that their car is in the best of care. Bennette's factory trained technicians are ASC Certified, and were selected with the customer in mind for their expertise and knowledge. They have over 75 years combined experience with BMW and Mercedes. His BMW factory diagnostic equipment is state of the art and Bennette's Motor World is 1 of 6 service centers in the state of Alabama that owns this system. The Mercedes diagnostic equipment is also the latest and most updated. Bennette welcomes you to Bennette's Motor World and will make sure your needs are met by a friendly and courteous staff with the quality and knowledge required for your automotive repairs.

Business Name: Duffy's Garage Land Rover, BMW, Jaguar, Audi, & Mini Cooper

Business Information:
We are a family owned and operated Honda, Acura, Nissan, Infiniti, Toyota and Lexus repair facility with 24 month or 24,000 mile warranty on most items. We take pride in delivering a higher level of quality service.  
ABOUT US.....As childhood friends, Eddie Cleveland and Angelo Roberson shared a passion for figuring out how things worked; specifically motorcycles and cars. More to the point, they spent a lot of time figuring out why something didnt work. Like most passions, it was only a matter of time before it became a profession. In 1983, Eddie and Angelo formed Robe Mans, working as mechanics servicing only Honda vehicles. When Honda introduced the upscale Acura line, they started servicing the Acura line. As time passed on, health concerns drove Angelo to retire. Eddie continued to run the ever-growing business, concentrating on maintaining the kind of personal and professional service that has earned Robe Mans a stellar reputation. In 2006, after numerous customer requests, Robe Mans decided to extend their services to include Toyota and Lexus, purchasing the building next door to their existing facility to accommodate the newly added lines. In 2012, again by popular demand and multiple customer requests, Rob'e Mans extended its professional service to include the Nissan and Infiniti brands. Today, Eddie Cleveland and the staff at Robe Mans continues to provide the kind of customer-focused service that started back in 1983, earning and keeping the trust of his customers by providing quality services with a personal touch.
